name: The Muses
slogan: A Non-Profit Organisation aimed at giving equal access to education for all
description:
The Muses is currently looking for developers and volunteers for all three of our current projects. We need web developers for The Muses and Cassandra, to help with the creation of these platforms.
We are also looking for AI and virtual reality experts to assist the Cassie project, which has the intention of making more immersive and enriching forms of education.

Come join us make the world a better place by making education available to everyone, regardless of your background.

team.title: Co-Founder & Managing Director
team.name: Tim Dommett
team.bioHtml: Lead Product Manager at Altitude Ads and Co-Founder of The Muses Ltd.

team.title: Software Developer
team.name: ROHIT KAMRA

IIT Grad, Worked at Goldman Sachs and High Frequency Trading Firms.
Experienced in developing systems for Low latency Trading systems.
Studied at IIT Guwahati.

team.title: Software Developer
team.name: Mohammed Sapin
team.bioHtml: I am a Senior at Rutgers University School of Engineering studying Electrical and Computer Engineering with a minor Business Administration.

team.title: Designer
team.name: Rhonabhee Sangalang
team.bioHtml: Aspiring Graphic Designer | Virtual Assistant  | Social Media Marketing

jobs.title: Animator & Video Editor
jobs.description:
We currently need someone who is willing to make a short animated video for our Non-Profit initiative, which will be for our funding campaigns and as an informational tool for our volunteers and supporters.

Come join us in an attempt to make the world a more fair and free place for everyone.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We currently need someone who is willing to make a short animated video for our Non-Profit initiative, which will be for our funding campaigns and as an informational tool for our volunteers and supporters.

Come join us in an attempt to make the world a more fair and free place for everyone.

jobs.title: Chief Technology Officer
jobs.description:
The Muses now has a large network of volunteer developers and is in need of a CTO or Senior Developer to manage the work that is being done by our developers and to ensure quality.

This position will mostly entail the management of our developers and the Pull Requests made to our repository and to ensure quality of the code is kept, as well as managing the forward momentum of our development process.

You will have product managers to help with both project management and with everything from documentation to the issuing of tasks to developers. After a probational period, the successful candidate will have the opportunity to gain a place on the board of our fast growing organisation if they are interested in this.

*Note: Please be aware that The Muses is a non-profit organisation and all of our employees are volunteers, we are unable to provide paid positions. The only compensation for your work is the feeling that you made the world a better place. Therefore, you can choose to contribute as many hours as you wish per week.*

jobs.title: Python Developer - Web Crawlers
jobs.description:
The Muses is currently cataloguing the extensive amount of free educational resources available online to centralise these resources and make it easier for students to find and learn.

We are currently looking for python developers who are familiar with creating web crawlers to automate this cataloguing process and to quickly traverse data on preexisting websites. If you want to try make the world a better place then join our team of volunteers.

*Note: Please be aware that The Muses is a non-profit organisation and all of our employees are volunteers, we are unable to provide paid positions. The only compensation for your work is the feeling that you made the world a better place. Therefore, you can choose to contribute as many hours as you wish per week.*

jobs.title: Quality Assurance Tester
jobs.description:
We are looking for a freelance QA Tester to work on a large E-Commerce and Digital Marketing company. This is a fully remote role, working from anywhere in the world for a London based highly succesful startup.

We are offering up to 40 hours per week at $15 - $20 per hour.

jobs.title: Software Project Manager
jobs.description:
We are looking for a volunteer Project Manager who is looking to grow their experience or contribute to a good cause. 

The successful candidate needs to have experience with software development or managing software development teams.

*Note: Please be aware that The Muses is a non-profit organisation and all of our employees are volunteers, we are unable to provide paid positions. The only compensation for your work is the feeling that you made the world a better place. Therefore, you can choose to contribute as many hours as you wish per week.*
